text: XHAWD-FM is a radio station located in the city of San Luis Potosí, San Luis Potosí, Mexico. Owned by the Fundación Nikola Tesla, A.C., a business of San Luis Potosí-based Grupo AWD, XHAWD-FM broadcasts on 107.1 FM and is known as Magnética FM. ==History== XHAWD came to air on March 12, 2005 and is one of several ventures of Grupo AWD, a scientific company that also produces audio processors and cathodic protection systems. ==References== Category:Radio stations established in 2005 Category:Radio stations in San Luis Potosí Category:Mass media in San Luis Potosí City
title: XHAWD-FM
